class battlenet_client.bnet.client.BNetClient(region: str, *, client_id: Optional[str] = None, client_secret: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[List[str]] = None, redirect_uri: Optional[str] = None)Â¶

Handles the communication using OAuth v2 client to the Battle.net REST API

Parameters

region (str) â region abbreviation for use with the APIs

Keyword Arguments

  • client_id (str) â the client ID from the developer portal

  • client_secret (str) â the client secret from the developer portal

  • scope (list, optional) â the scope or scopes to use during the endpoints that require the Web Application Flow

  • redirect_uri (str, optional) â the URI to return after a successful authentication between the user and Blizzard
